fval.name: description
fval.value:
Local implementation of the REST Currencies API. This implementation makes use of static 'Set Message' ressources and javascripts.
Excercises should be done using the client implementation.

fval.name: notes
fval.value: Retrieve details about a particular currency

fval.name: description
fval.value: Retrieve the exchange rate for a particular currency

fval.name: notes
fval.value: Retrieve the exchange rate for a particular currency. If not specified the base (from) currency is USD. The query 'base' parameter allow to change it to another value.

fval.name: notes
fval.value: Retrieve list of exchange rates for currencies (retrieved the 2005/12/18 from https://openexchangerates.org/)

fval.name: description
